mainBoard.name: Goblin Researcher
mainBoard.originalText: When Goblin Researcher enters the battlefield, exile the top card of your library. During any turn you attacked with Goblin Researcher, you may play that card.

rulings.text: Casting an exiled card causes it to leave exile. You can't cast it multiple times.
Goblin Researcher's effect doesn't change when you can play the exiled card. For example, if you exile a sorcery card, you can cast it only during your main phase when the stack is empty.
If you control more than one card named Goblin Researcher, each one's effect is independent from the other. Specifically, attacking with one will not allow you to play the card exiled by the other.

If you exile a land card with Goblin Researcher's enters-the-battlefield ability, you may play that land only if you have any available land plays. Normally, this means you can play the land only if you haven't played a land yet that turn.
The card Goblin Researcher exiles is exiled face up.
You can play the exiled card if Goblin Researcher attacked and is still in combat, has left combat, has left the battlefield, or even if combat is over.

foreignData.text: Crea tres fichas de criatura Trasgo rojas 1/1.

mainBoard.name: Hordeling Outburst
mainBoard.originalText: Create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
mainBoard.text: Create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

mainBoard.flavorText: Don't underestimate the aerodynamic qualities of the common goblin.

foreignData.flavorText: 别小看了一般鬼怪的空气动力学品质。
foreignData.name: 鬼怪手榴弹
foreignData.text:
牺牲一个鬼怪，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。
鬼怪手榴弹对任意一个目标造成5点伤害。

foreignData.flavorText: Ne sous-estimez pas les qualités aérodynamiques du gobelin de base.
foreignData.name: Grenade gobeline
foreignData.text:
En tant que coût supplémentaire pour lancer ce sort, sacrifiez un gobelin.
La Grenade gobeline inflige 5 blessures à n'importe quelle cible.

foreignData.flavorText: Unterschätze niemals die aerodynamischen Eigenschaften eines ganz normalen Goblins.
foreignData.name: Goblingranate
foreignData.text:
Opfere einen Goblin als zusätzliche Kosten, um diesen Zauberspruch zu wirken.
Die Goblingranate fügt einem Ziel deiner Wahl 5 Schadenspunkte zu.

foreignData.flavorText: Non sottovalutare le qualità aerodinamiche del goblin comune.
foreignData.name: Granata Goblin
foreignData.text:
Come costo addizionale per lanciare questa magia, sacrifica un Goblin.
La Granata Goblin infligge 5 danni a un qualsiasi bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: 一般的なゴブリンの空力性能を馬鹿にするもんじゃない。
foreignData.name: ゴブリンの手投げ弾
foreignData.text:
この呪文を唱えるための追加コストとして、ゴブリン１体を生け贄に捧げる。
クリーチャーやプレインズウォーカーやプレイヤーのうち１つを対象とする。ゴブリンの手投げ弾はそれに５点のダメージを与える。

foreignData.flavorText: No subestimes las cualidades aerodinámicas de un trasgo común.
foreignData.name: Granada trasgo
foreignData.text:
Como coste adicional para lanzar este hechizo, sacrifica un Trasgo.
La Granada trasgo hace 5 puntos de daño a cualquier objetivo.

mainBoard.name: Goblin Grenade
mainBoard.originalText:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a Goblin.
Goblin Grenade deals 5 damage to any target.

rulings.text: You can't sacrifice more than one Goblin to get a greater effect.
Players can only respond once Goblin Grenade has been cast and all its costs have been paid. No one can try and destroy the Goblin to prevent you from casting Goblin Grenade.
The Goblin you sacrifice to cast Goblin Grenade doesn't have to be a creature. For example, you could sacrifice Boggart Shenanigans (a kindred enchantment with the subtype Goblin).

mainBoard.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a Goblin.
Goblin Grenade deals 5 damage to any target.

mainBoard.flavorText: Gront realized that his brilliant plan of being faster than Kork might still not be enough.

foreignData.flavorText: 格隆特发现自己「只要比喀罗克快就行」的绝妙计划好像还是不行。

foreignData.flavorText: Gront réalisa que son plan brillant pour devancer Kork ne serait peut-être pas suffisant.
foreignData.name: Chair à dragon

foreignData.flavorText: Gront wurde klar, dass sein genialer Plan, schneller als Kork zu sein, vielleicht doch nicht ausreichen würde.
foreignData.name: Drachenfutter

foreignData.flavorText: Gront capì che il suo brillante piano di essere più veloce di Kork non sarebbe comunque stato abbastanza.

foreignData.flavorText: グローントは、コークより速く走るという名案だけでは無理だと悟った。

foreignData.flavorText: Gront se dio cuenta de que su magnífico plan de ser más rápido que Kork tal vez no fuera suficiente.

foreignData.text: Crea dos fichas de criatura Trasgo rojas 1/1.

mainBoard.name: Dragon Fodder
mainBoard.originalText: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
mainBoard.text: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

mainBoard.flavorText: As eons passed, the rock wore away, revealing the rich colors at the mountain's heart.

foreignData.flavorText: 无数世代过去，石头磨损，显露出高山核心处的丰富颜色。
foreignData.name: 兴旺绝壁
foreignData.text:
兴旺绝壁须横置进战场。
于兴旺绝壁进战场时，选择一种红色以外的颜色。
{T}：加{R}或一点所选颜色的法术力。

foreignData.flavorText: Au fil des éons, la pierre s'est érodée, révélant les couleurs vives du cœur de la montagne.
foreignData.name: Promontoire prospère
foreignData.text:
Le Promontoire prospère arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé.
Au moment où le Promontoire prospère arrive sur le champ de bataille, choisissez une couleur autre que le rouge.
{T} : Ajoutez {R} ou un mana de la couleur choisie.

foreignData.flavorText: Im Laufe der Äonen wurde der Fels abgetragen, sodass die satten Farben im Herzen des Gebirges sichtbar wurden.
foreignData.name: Gedeihende Felsklippe
foreignData.text:
Die Gedeihende Felsklippe kommt getappt ins Spiel.
Sowie die Gedeihende Felsklippe ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe außer Rot.
{T}: Erzeuge {R} oder ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText: Col passare delle ere, la pietra si erose, rivelando i brillanti colori nel cuore della montagna.
foreignData.name: Falesia Florida
foreignData.text:
La Falesia Florida entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata.
Mentre la Falesia Florida entra nel campo di battaglia, scegli un colore diverso dal rosso.
{T}: Aggiungi {R} o un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText: 悠久の時を経て岩肌は削られ、山の中心の豊かな色彩が露わになった。
foreignData.name: 興隆する絶壁
foreignData.text:
興隆する絶壁はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
興隆する絶壁が戦場に出るに際し、赤でない色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：{R} か、その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

foreignData.flavorText: A medida que pasaban los siglos, la roca se iba erosionando, revelando así los bellos colores del corazón de la montaña.
foreignData.name: Risco floreciente
foreignData.text:
El Risco floreciente entra al campo de batalla girado.
En cuanto el Risco floreciente entre al campo de batalla, elige un color que no sea rojo.
{T}: Agrega {R} o un maná del color elegido.

mainBoard.name: Thriving Bluff
mainBoard.originalText:
Thriving Bluff enters the battlefield tapped.
As Thriving Bluff enters the battlefield, choose a color other than red.
{T}: Add {R} or one mana of the chosen color.
mainBoard.text:
This land enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than red.
{T}: Add {R} or one mana of the chosen color.
